titleStmt.title: Another miraculous victorie obtained by the Lord Fairfax, against the Earl of Newcastle, at Barnham-Moore, where 1500. men were slain, with the number of officers, colours, commanders, and common souldiers that were taken prisoners, with ordnance, arms and ammunition: as it was informed to some members of the House on Monday the 12. of June. 1643.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
